code: import React from'react';import{useCart}from'../context/CartContext';import'./CartItem.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CartItem=_ref=>{let{item}=_ref;const{updateQuantity,removeFromCart}=useCart();const handleQuantityChange=newQuantity=>{updateQuantity(item.id,newQuantity);};const handleRemove=()=>{removeFromCart(item.id);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cart-item-image-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.image,alt:item.name,className:"cart-item-image"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-item-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"cart-item-name",children:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"cart-item-description",children:item.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-item-price",children:["$",item.price.toFixed(2)," each"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-item-actions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"quantity-controls",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"quantity-btn",onClick:()=>handleQuantityChange(item.quantity-1),disabled:item.quantity<=1,children:"\u2212"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:item.quantity,onChange:e=>handleQuantityChange(parseInt(e.target.value)||0),className:"quantity-input",min:"1",max:"99"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"quantity-btn",onClick:()=>handleQuantityChange(item.quantity+1),children:"+"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-danger btn-sm",onClick:handleRemove,children:"Remove"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-item-total",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"item-total-price",children:["$",(item.price*item.quantity).toFixed(2)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"item-quantity",children:[item.quantity," \xD7 $",item.price.toFixed(2)]})]})]});};export default CartItem;
